resources.string: Undergrad student, Coder, and Developer. Philosophic about the whys of life, and poetic about the hows.
My interests , though largely revolving around code and programming, also include singing, playing the guitar and being polemic about life and its unjust ways, using words and write ups,of course.

I am an undergraduate engineering student from an average(read 3rd tier) institution in/around Delhi. Although, I have now, started getting over the lamenting of being stuck nowhere in life, steadily building upon the options I have to achieve a starry career in IT and Software. My goal is to become a known in the Industry and tread along the lines of success, for it is of foremost importance to me to prove to my akin, how important it is to follow thy own path.
As of now, nothing official. Hope to break the duck, though.
The final forming of a person\'s character lies in their own hands.\n-ANNE FRANK.
